dataset_id: SMAPVEX12 Probe-Based In Situ Soil Moisture Data for Forest Area V001
organizations: NASA DAAC at the National Snow and Ice Data Center
title: SMAPVEX12 Probe-Based In Situ Soil Moisture Data for Forest Area V001
summary: This data set contains in situ soil moisture data collected at several forested sites as a part of the Soil Moisture Active Passive Validation Experiment 2012 (SMAPVEX12).

cmr.title: SMAPVEX12 Probe-Based In Situ Soil Moisture Data for Forest Area V001
cmr.summary: This data set contains in situ soil moisture data collected at several forested sites as a part of the Soil Moisture Active Passive Validation Experiment 2012 (SMAPVEX12).
